name: src/_references.js
src/collection.js
Collection
description: RESTful Collection Management Class

name: values
description: Get an iterator of all models in this collection

name: entries
description: Get an iterator of all [ID, model] tuples in this collection.

name: count
description: alias for `length`

name: length
description: Returns current `models` length

name: url
description: getter for API URI for Collection

name: reset
description: Resets collection to empty `Array`

name: fetch
description:
Performs REST::GET Operation to populate collection
note: uses Query if present

name: create
description: Adds Model to Collection and saves to remote collection by default

params.name: immediate
params.description: set to `false` to add to collection without saving to remote

name: add
description: Adds Object to Model without updating remote collection

name: at
description: Get the model at the given index

name: modelClass
description: Getter for Model Class with embedded back-references to this NS::Collection

name: save
description: Batch saves Objects that are new or need updating

name: subscribe
description: TODO: should be observable

name: valueOf
description: Accessor for Collection's Primitive Value

name: toJSON
description: Accessor for Collection's `JSON` representation

name: toString
description: Accessor for Collection's `String` representation

name: src/defaults.js
src/index.js
src/inflections.js
src/metadata.js
src/model.js
data
description: returns data from RxVO Document

name: data
description: sets data to RxVO Document

name: attrs
description: alias for data getter

name: attrs
description: alias for data setter

name: get
description: retrieves data at key

name: set
description: sets value upon key

name: modelCreatedOn
description: returns creation time of Model in Application

name: modelUpdatedOn
description: returns last updated time of Model in Application

name: src/namespace.js
NS
description:
Namespace
* Defines and Manages Collections
* Initializes Options
* Provides utility methods

name: options
description: Accessor for defined API Options for Namespace

name: options
description: Setter for Namespace API Options

name: getOption
description: Accessor for Option at Key

name: setOption
description: Sets individual Option at Key

name: collections
description: Accessor for Schema Collections Map

name: listCollections
description: Retrieved list of registered Collection names

name: addCollection
description: Adds Collection to Namespace

name: removeCollection
description: Removes Collection from Namespace

name: Utils
description: Utility Methods

name: apiOptions
description: Helper Method returns REST Request Headers from Config

name: apiUrl
description: Helper Method generates URL for REST Requests

name: parseDate
description: Implementation of Parse._parseDate used to parse iso8601 UTC formatted `datetime`

name: querify
description: Returns passes object as Key/Value paired string

name: src/ns_schema.js
src/query.js
find
description: Executes query and returns all results

name: first
description: Executes query and returns only the first result

name: exists
description: Sets condition that column must exist

name: doesNotExist
description: Sets condition that column must not exist

name: greaterThan
description: Sets condition that column value must be greater than given value

name: greaterThanOrEqualTo
description: Sets condition that column value must be greater than or equal to the given value

name: lessThan
description: Sets condition that column value must be less than given value

name: lessThanOrEqualTo
description: Sets condition that column value must be less than or equal to the given value

name: containsAll
description: Sets condition that column value must be an array containing all items in given array

name: _quote
description: Implementation of Parse _quote to create RegExp from string value

content:
# Jisty
Schema Based OXM (ORM + ODM) RESTful Client Library
name: ./README.md

content:
{
  "name": "hero",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "Schema Based OXM (ORM + ODM) RESTful Client Library",
  "main": "index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "test": "jest",
    "docs": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/Webfreshener/hero.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "ORM",
    "ODM",
    "REST",
    "Model",
    "Collection",
    "Data",
    "API",
    "Client"
  ],
  "author": "Van Schroeder <van@webfreshener.com>",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/Webfreshener/hero/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/Webfreshener/hero#readme",
  "dependencies": {
    "rxvo": "git+https://github.com/webfreshener/rxvo.git",
    "lodash.assign": "^4.2.0",
    "lodash.assignin": "^4.2.0",
    "lodash.find": "^4.6.0",
    "lodash.flatten": "^4.4.0",
    "lodash.foreach": "^4.5.0",
    "lodash.map": "^4.6.0",
    "lodash.pairs": "^3.0.1",
    "lodash.uniqueid": "^4.0.1",
    "rxjs": "^5.5.6"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "babel-cli": "^6.26.0",
    "babel-jest": "^22.4.3",
    "babel-loader": "^7.1.3",
    "babel-plugin-transform-remove-strict-mode": "0.0.2",
    "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
    "babel-register": "^6.18.0",
    "chai": "^4.1.2",
    "cross-fetch": "^2.1.0",
    "deep-equal": "^1.0.1",
    "es6-weak-map": "^2.0.1",
    "esdoc": "^1.0.4",
    "esdoc-accessor-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-exclude-source-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "eslint": "^4.19.0",
    "jest": "^22.4.3",
    "jest-babel-istanbul": "^0.1.0",
    "jest-each": "^0.3.1",
    "jshint": "^2.9.4",
    "mocha": "^5.0.0",
    "mocha-lcov-reporter": "^1.3.0",
    "nock": "^9.2.3",
    "weakmap": "0.0.6",
    "webpack": "^4.0.1",
    "webpack-cli": "^2.0.10"
  },
  "jest": {
    "transform": {
      ".*": "<rootDir>/node_modules/babel-jest"
    },
    "unmockedModulePathPatterns": [
      "<rootDir>/node_modules/nock"
    ]
  }
}
name: package.json
